body_html: Thanks for your comment. My point is that under some conditions (i.e. filters not being multiple of 8 or 16), the training performance is sub-optimal and half of the time is spent repacking tensors.
body_text: Thanks for your comment. My point is that under some conditions (i.e. filters not being multiple of 8 or 16), the training performance is sub-optimal and half of the time is spent repacking tensors.
body: Thanks for your comment. My point is that under some conditions (i.e. filters not being multiple of 8 or 16), the training performance is sub-optimal and half of the time is spent repacking tensors.
